arts.ttl: Evander Da Silva Ferreira scores twice as Cincinnati tops Fire 3-2 for fourth straight victory
arts.sum: His second goal — and sixth in his first season with the club — came in the 71st minute with an assist from Luca Orellano for a 3-1 lead. Evander Da Silva Ferreira scored a goal in each half and FC Cincinnati upped its win streak to four with a 3-2 victory over the Chicago Fire on Saturday night.
